title: Bloomberg Markets: E3 Pits Big Games vs. Record Expectations
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: E3 Pits Big Games vs. Record Expectations
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Matthew Kanterman Video Game and Telecom Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing a preview on the E3 the biggest video game industry conference of the year.
